## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b1e36c55069fe1374c19441b5e3cbabd0ba1bc120d2d1651dd5570157a8a9c57)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'everestsystems-content-core' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
